# Celestial Timekeepers
## Scripture
"For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven." - Ecclesiastes 3:1

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky during the winter season, we're reminded of the celestial timekeepers that regulate our lives. The planets, with their consistent orbits, and the stars, with their predictable patterns, all contribute to the harmony of our universe. Just as the celestial bodies move in synchrony, our lives are also governed by rhythms and seasons. The Bible reminds us that there is a time for everything, and God is the ultimate Timekeeper. He ordains the seasons of our lives, guiding us through times of growth, rest, and renewal.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, thank you for being the ultimate Timekeeper of our lives. Help us to trust in your sovereignty and wisdom as you guide us through the different seasons of our lives. May we be attentive to your rhythms and timing, and may our lives be a reflection of your harmonious and orderly creation. As we navigate the ups and downs of life, remind us that you are always with us, orchestrating every moment for our good and your glory. Amen.
